Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
These goods are pretty run-of-the-mill. Having a
good selection is important, you know.

<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
Hmm, they've still got the same selection here,
but the quality's gone up, I'd say.

<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
This town sells good-quality products. That's
very important.

<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
You can buy anything in this town! This is great!

<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
Hm? Are you shopping here, too?

<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
Oh, you're selling good stuff, aren't you?

<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
You know, even though this town doesn't really
sell anything worth buying, I still kind of like it
here.

<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
I'm trying to support this town. It's small, but it's
got a lot of passion. Keep working hard!

<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
This town's really grown, hasn't it? Not that I
can take any credit for that, but at least I can say
I was here to see it happen.

<NAME_MOB_KLOZE>
This town's gotten huge, and it's all thanks to
your guys' hard work. You should all be proud of
that.
